alert.note: Alert for Erie (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 1:14AM EST until further notice by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by the release of an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Along the Huron River north of Milan in Erie County Ohio. * WHEN...Until 700 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding along low lying portions of the Huron River is possible between Milan and Lake Erie. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 106 AM EST, gauge reports indicated an ice jam has broken up near Milan and water backed up behind the jam is moving downstream. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly near the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Franklin Flats Huron - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
